full_summary:
**Federal Government Tender Announcement for CCGS Robertson Alongside Refit**

** Tender Information **
* Tender Title: CCGS Robertson Alongside Refit
* Solicitation Number: WS3935158615
* Tender Closing Date: April 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: March 28, 2023

** Procurement Details **
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Buyer Information**
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) / Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
* Contact Name: LaBrash, Rachelle
* Contact Email: rachelle.labrash@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

** Tender Requirements **
The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites bidders to submit proposals for the CCGS Robertson Alongside Refit. The requirement is being procured under the provision of Supply Arrangement E6HAL-160002 Ship Repairs Halifax Harbour.

** Description of Work **
* Carrying out the alongside refit of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans vessel CCGS Private Robertson SC in accordance with the Requirement at Annex A.
* Performing any approved unscheduled work not covered in Annex A.
* Conducting the refit period at BIO in Dartmouth, NS, from May 17 to June 14, 2023.

** Bidder Requirements**
* Bids must be submitted through CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba).
* Consult Part 2 – Bidder Instructions and Part 3 – Bid Preparation Instructions for further information.

** Mandatory Requirements **
* Bidder must clearly indicate their complete company name.
* A bid submission will be considered invalid if the company name is not complete.

**Important Contact Information**
For more information about this procurement, please contact Rachelle LaBrash at the Department of Public Works and Government Services at rachelle.labrash@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

This is the cleaned up text. There were some typos or semi-clear text we cleared up for you. Let us know if you need any further assistance! 

All the best, 
Dan Taylor
